page.title: 12A DAY IN MONYASH
page.content: {Saturday,July 13th. { 7.53 a.m.}I got up and got dressed - very early for me.I usually stay in bed until 11.00 a.m. on a Saturday. { 8.16 a.m.}I went to get some cakes from Mrs.Frost for our jumble sale. { 9.00 a.m.}The Jumble Sale. Joanne, Alison,Susan and I organised the sale to raise funds for a ponies' rest- home. It was held in Flagg village hall and we raised Â£61.77p. { 1.15 p.m.}Mum, Andrew and I went to Bakewell. Mum bought some clothes. {1.45 p.m.}Back home for lunch. {3.00 p.m.}Andrew and I went to a birthday party at our neighbour's house.We played musical bumps and musical statues. { 5.30 p.m.}Went out to play 'chase'. { 6.00 p.m.}Went home to watch the television. { 10.30 p.m.}Went to bed.
